name: istqb-study-app
description: Progressive Web App para preparaci√≥n ISTQB Foundation Level

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=packages/shared && npm run build --workspace=packages/web && npm run build --workspace=packages/api
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage --workspace=packages/api && npm run test --workspace=packages/web -- --coverage
scripts.validate: npm run type-check && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.validate:api: npm run type-check --workspace=packages/api && npm run build --workspace=packages/api
scripts.validate:web: npm run type-check --workspace=packages/web && npm run build --workspace=packages/web
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch --workspaces && git add . && git commit -m "chore: bump version" && git push
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor --workspaces && git add . && git commit -m "chore: bump version" && git push
scripts.version:major: npm version major --workspaces && git add . && git commit -m "chore: bump version" && git push
